title: Meni sev
overview: According to Uzbek traditions, a bride for a son is chosen by his parents. Imagine Anvar's (25) surprise when his first school love agreed to marry him. But immediately after the wedding, Anvar realizes that it was a forced marriage, and Afruza does not love him. Being an honest and decent person by nature, contrary to tradition, Anvar promises his beloved that he will not touch her until she truly loves him. And he begins to seek the love of his wife.
